title: 73/214.  Observer status for the International Council for the Exploration of the Sea in the General Assembly
text:
United Nations 
A/RES/73/214
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: General 
11 January 2019 
 
18-22533 (E)    150119     
*1822533* 
 
 
Seventy-third session 
Agenda item 175 
 
 
 
 
 Resolution adopted by the General Assembly 
on 20 December 2018 
 
 
 
 
[on the report of the Sixth Committee (A/73/465)] 
 
 
 73/214.  Observer status for the International Council for the Exploration 
of the Sea in the General Assembly  
 
 
 
The General Assembly,  
 
Wishing to promote cooperation between the United Nations and the 
International Council for the Exploration of the Sea,  
 
1. 
Decides to invite the International Council for the Exploration of the Sea 
to participate in the sessions and the work of the General Assembly in the capacity of 
observer;  
 
2. 
Requests the Secretary-General to take the action necessary to implement 
the present resolution.  
 
62nd plenary meeting  
20 December 2018

paragraphs.1: Decides to invite the International Council for the Exploration of the Sea to participate in the sessions and the work of the General Assembly in the capacity of observer;
paragraphs.2: Requests the Secretary-General to take the action necessary to implement the present resolution.
